Constructs new piecewise linear distribution object.

@1@ Constructs a distribution object with ''n'' = 1, ''œÅ0'' = 1, ''b0'' = 0, and ''b1'' = 1.

@2@ Constructs a distribution object from iterators over the interval sequence {{range|first_i|last_i}} and a matching weight sequence starting at {{c|first_w}}.

@3@ Constructs a distribution object where the intervals are taken from the initializer list {{c|ilist}} and the weights generated by the function {{c|fw}}.

@4@ Constructs a distribution object with the {{c|fw}} intervals distributed uniformly over {{c|[xmin, xmax]}}.

@5@ Constructs a distribution object initialized with the parameters {{c|param}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|first_i|iterator initialized to the start of the interval sequence}}
{{par|last_i|iterator initialized to one-past-the-end of the interval sequence}}
{{par|first_w|iterator initialized to the start of the density (weight) sequence}}
{{par|ilist|initializer_list yielding the interval sequence}}
{{par|fw|double(double) function yielding the densities}}
{{par|nw|the number of densities}}
{{par|xmin|the lower bound of the interval sequence}}
{{par|xmax|the upper bound of the interval sequence}}
{{par|parm|the distribution parameter set}}
{{par end}}
